nodes.text: Dek Anorik was a male smuggler. After being captured by the Galactic Empire alongside his best friend on Gacerian, Anorik was offered a deal in exchange for his freedom. Posing as a prospector, he would attempt to lure Rebels and free-traders to Gacerian by telling stories of the planet's wealth in gemstones. Those that Anorik lured to the planet would then by put to work mining the gems. To ensure Anorik's cooperation, his friend remained under Imperial protection on Gacerian.
